dcterms:creator: F. Rangel
P. Rosso
B. Ghanem
A. Giachanou
dcterms:description: The PAN 2020 author profiling corpus consists of 300 English and Spanish Twitter user accounts, with each account containing 100 tweets stored in XML format. The dataset is balanced, with half of the documents per language folder from authors identified as sharing fake news and the other half from credible users.
dcterms:title: PAN 2020 author profiling corpus

dcterms:creator: M. Potthast
T. Gollub
M. Wiegmann
B. Stein
dcterms:description: The TIRA Integrated Research Architecture is a platform that provides evaluation services for information retrieval tasks, including the PAN 2020 challenge.
dcterms:title: TIRA Integrated Research Architecture

dcterms:creator: F. Rangel
A. Giachanou
B. Ghanem
P. Rosso
dcterms:description: The PAN 2020 test dataset is used for evaluating the performance of models in the author profiling task, specifically for profiling fake news spreaders on Twitter.
dcterms:title: PAN 2020 test dataset
